content:
**EXISTING STRUCTURES**

### Electricity Generator at Position (10, 20)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (11, 20)
- Boiler at position (10, 21)
- Offshore Pump at position (9, 20)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (25, 35)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (25, 36) and a Furnace at position (26, 36)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (25, 37) and a Furnace at position (26, 37)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (25, 38) and a Furnace at position (26, 38)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (40, 50)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40, 51) and a Furnace at position (41, 51)
- Assembling Machine at position (42, 50) and Inserter at position (41, 50) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup at position (41, 51) that connects the Furnace at position (41, 51) to the Assembling Machine at position (42, 50)

**ERROR TIPS**

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors in Incorrect API Usage
- Verify the API documentation to ensure correct usage of functions and parameters.

### Errors in Misaligned Conveyor Belts
- Align conveyor belts correctly to ensure items are transported efficiently between entities.

### Errors in Power Connectivity
- Ensure all machines that require power are connected to a power source. Check for missing power poles or disconnected lines.
